column1: Uchi////Some details. We put ourselves at our waiters mercy since we were newbies. We told him we liked the tasting menu
column2: and so he suggested that he would mostly follow the official tasting menu
column4: without permission deviate a bit. And it worked out extremely well. We had about 8 courses
column5: and 3 glasses of wine (three different types)
column6: and all were great. I found it interesting that they had waiters and servers
column7: and teh servers were very knowledgable themselves
column8: which speaks volumes about teh training they must receive.
